title: Why is New FrostBlade Irelia so different
body: New FrostBlade Irelia doesnt even look similar to the cool gold and blue skin i love why they got to change it to a stupid winter wonderland skin.... HMPPFFT!

Doesn't seem that different to me?

Nah but ass jokes aside, I do see where you're coming from.
The old colours are much more 'fresh'.

And for a skin that isn't 'Winter Wonder' it looks a hell of a lot like Winter Wonder Karma. Too much so.

Im not an irelia player, but I too would have preferred something more akin to the old skin _(at very least keep the hair that cool ice blue)_.
